title: odd "null" text appears on message window below menu and above toolbar
content:
After installing Thunderbird 115.2.0 (64-bit) yesterday, all of my email messages (not when I'm composing, but all that I receive and those that I later view from my Sent folder), have this odd "null" text in the top left corner, below the menu and just above (and to the left of) the window toolbar.

Any ideas what could be causing that (and how to fix it)? I expect it's taking up a whole line (i.e., if I can get rid of it, the toolbar will presumably move up to be immediately under the menu).
creator: doug-TBird
